Projects

space-invaders

JavaScript HTML CSS SCSS Firebase

Developed a two-player Space Invaders clone. Player 1 uses the arrow keys to move and spacebar to shoot. Player 2 uses WASD to move and shift to shoot. The game is currently hosted using Firebase. Go check it out and see if you can beat the highscore!

Check out the repository! Play the game!

garden-design

Java JavaFX MVC

Clone of my team's final project for one of my software engineering courses. We developed a piece of software using MVC and JavaFX that allowed customers to model their backyard and design their own garden before planting any plants.

Check out the repository!

my-shell

C C++

Developed my own unix shell with C/C++!

Check out the repository!

HTML Tailwind CSS JavaScript Jekyll Liquid

This is the source code for the website you are currently on! I used Jekyll to help me build this website as well as Tailwind CSS to really increase my efficiency designing it.

Check out the repository!

cyber-blog

HTML Tailwind CSS JavaScript Jekyll Liquid

This is the source code for my cybersecurity blog. I figured the best way to learn cybersecurity is to write about it! So here you can find write-ups for CTF challenges, articles about certain topics and even quick notes about different things that I want to remember. Click the Cyber Blog item on the navigation menu to go and check it out.

Check out the repository!

This is a website I built for my parents side business. This project allowed me to get a much better understanding for PHP as well as caused me to start exploring MVC.

Check out the repository! Check out the site!

signals-and-systems-analysis-1

Python Matplotlib NumPy SciPy

This is the Jupyter Notebook I used to analyze signals and systems for one of my electrical engineering courses. I utilized my Python knowledge as well as became familiar with Matplotlib, NumPy, and SciPy to complete this assignment.

Check out the repository!

Python Matplotlib NumPy SciPy

This is another Jupyter Notebook I used to analyze signals and systems for one of my electrical engineering courses. I utilized my Python knowledge as well as became familiar with Matplotlib, NumPy, and SciPy to complete this assignment.

Check out the repository!

autonomous-sanitizing-robot

C++

This is the source code for my Senior Design project that is currently underway. The goal of this project is to build a fully-autonomous robot that can sanitize countertop surfaces to prevent the spread of COVID-19. This repo will be continously updated as I finish my studies over the next couple of months.

Check out the repository!

supreme-checkout-bot

Java Selenium JUnit

After becoming proficient in Selenium during my internship, I attempted to build a bot that could buy clothing from Supreme to obtain the goods before they sold out. I got the bot to work correctly, however, the anti-bot mechanism's in place such as reCAPTCHA brought my progress to a halt.

Check out the repository!
